CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-2-TEXT: You can attack no other target for 1d4 rounds (or until the target is dead)].
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-3-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-8-TEXT: You take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage and a -2 penalty on attack rolls with that attack for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-9-TEXT: You kick up dust that %STATUS-BLINDED=blinds% you for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-10-TEXT: You take 1d6 points of damage + your Str modifier.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-12-TEXT: Your attack hits the target but the target may start a grapple against you for free.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-13-TEXT: You can only take a move action next round.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-14-TEXT: The target deals bite damage to you.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-15-TEXT: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-16-TEXT: You cannot use this attack for 1 round.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-19-TEXT: You become %STATUS-ENTANGLED=entangled% in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-20-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-21-TEXT: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-22-TEXT: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-23-TEXT: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-24-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty on attack rolls for 1d6 minutes.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-25-TEXT: Your enemy's armor takes 1d6 points of damage. You take 1d6 points of damage and cannot use that attack for 1d3 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-26-TEXT: If this was a bite attack, you are %STATUS-NAUSEATED=nauseated% for 1d6 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-27-TEXT: You take 1d4 points of damage and you cannot use this attack %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-32-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-33-TEXT: Your target takes normal damage, you take double damage.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-34-TEXT: The target may attempt to trip, bull rush or overrun you (target's choice).
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-38-TEXT: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-40-TEXT: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-41-TEXT: Your attack deals damage to all targets adjacent to you except the original target.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-42-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty on skill checks and saves for 1d4 hours.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-43-TEXT: You threaten no squares for 1d6 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-44-TEXT: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke attacks of opportunity as normal.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-46-TEXT: If this was a claw attack, slam or unarmed strike, you cannot use that attack for 1d6 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-47-TEXT: Your attack hits, but you are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 2 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort save% reduces the stun to 1 round).
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-48-TEXT: If you had reach greater than 5 feet, it is reduced to 5 feet for 3 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-49-TEXT: Your target's armor and natural armor bonuses are doubled against you for 3 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-NATURAL-50-TEXT: You take 1d3 points of damage and your speed is halved %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
